languages.text: "Они, конечно, истово верующие и даже в каком-то смысле помогают поддерживать порядок в отсеке, но у меня от них кровь стынет в жилах".

traits.locale_text: "Они, конечно, истово верующие и даже в каком-то смысле помогают поддерживать порядок в отсеке, но у меня от них кровь стынет в жилах".

languages.text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."
languages.original_text: "Они, конечно, истово верующие и даже в каком-то смысле помогают поддерживать порядок в отсеке, но у меня от них кровь стынет в жилах".

traits.locale_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."
"I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

"I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

languages.text: «Es indiscutible que estas personas son muy devotas y que ayudan a mantener el orden por aquí a su manera pero, aun así, verlas hace que se me hiele la sangre».
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

traits.locale_text: «Es indiscutible que estas personas son muy devotas y que ayudan a mantener el orden por aquí a su manera pero, aun así, verlas hace que se me hiele la sangre».

languages.text: 「あの者達が実に信仰心が高く、彼らのやり方でこの辺の秩序の維持に一役買っているという事実に異論はありませんが、それでもあの姿を見ると肝が冷えます」
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

traits.locale_text: 「あの者達が実に信仰心が高く、彼らのやり方でこの辺の秩序の維持に一役買っているという事実に異論はありませんが、それでもあの姿を見ると肝が冷えます」

languages.text: “这些人确实非常虔诚，这点无可否认，他们会以他们自己的方式协助维持秩序。不过，每次看到他们，我还是会不寒而栗。
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

traits.locale_text: “这些人确实非常虔诚，这点无可否认，他们会以他们自己的方式协助维持秩序。不过，每次看到他们，我还是会不寒而栗。

languages.text: « Je ne peux nier que ces gens sont de vrais dévots et qu'ils contribuent à leur manière au maintien de l'ordre au sein de l'équipage, mais quoi qu'il en soit, leur seule présence suffit à me glacer le sang. »
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux nier que ces gens sont de vrais dévots et qu'ils contribuent à leur manière au maintien de l'ordre au sein de l'équipage, mais quoi qu'il en soit, leur seule présence suffit à me glacer le sang. »

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht abstreiten, dass diese Leute wirklich aufrichtig sind und auf ihre Art helfen, die Ordnung aufrecht zu erhalten. Aber bei ihrem Anblick sträuben sich mir noch immer die Haare."
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nicht abstreiten, dass diese Leute wirklich aufrichtig sind und auf ihre Art helfen, die Ordnung aufrecht zu erhalten. Aber bei ihrem Anblick sträuben sich mir noch immer die Haare."

languages.text: "Bu insanların hakikaten inançlı oldukları ve kendilerince buradaki düzeni korumaya yardımcı oldukları gerçeğine karşı çıkamam. Ancak onları görmek bile tüylerimi diken diken ediyor."
languages.original_text: "I can't argue with the fact that these people are truly devout and that they help to uphold order around here in their own way, but the sight of them still chills my blood."
